extDescription.message: Optionally open new tabs in the front.

disabledTime.description: State displayed in popup, the $1 gets replaces with 01:23 for minutes:seconds.

enableButton.description: Option displayed in popup when disabled.

disableButton5.description: Option displayed in popup, disables for 5 minutes then automatically enables again.

disableButton15.description: Option displayed in popup, disables for 15 minutes then automatically enables again.

disableButton30.description: Option displayed in popup, disables for 30 minutes then automatically enables again.

disableButton60.description: Option displayed in popup, disables for 60 minutes then automatically enables again.

disableButtonPerm.description: Option displayed in popup, disables until enabled again.

ignoreButton.description: Option displayed in popup, disables on this domain.

donate.description: Option displayed in popup, opens a popup window to paypal.

options.description: Option displayed in popup, opens a the extension options page in a new tab.

optionsHideDonate.description: Checkbox on options page, this hides the popup option.

optionsHideOptions.description: Checkbox on options page, this hides the popup option.

optionsHideIgnore.message: Disable ignore list and hide ignore button
optionsHideIgnore.description: Checkbox on options page, this disables the Ignore list and hides the popup option.

optionsDomain.description: Input box on options page, add a new domain to the ignore list.

keyboardShortcutToggle.description: Keyboard shortcut, toggles between Enabled and Disabled.

keyboardShortcutIgnore.description: Keyboard shortcut, toggles whether the current domain is on the ignore list.
